s_synopsis: A long time ago, in a Bomberman World far away, there was a group of four evil people called the Dark Force Bombers, who wanted to turn the world into darkness. Our ancestors rallied together and successfully sealed the evil ones into the Blue Crystal. However, after four hundred years, some evil guy named Burglar mysteriously appeared and released the baddies from the Blue Crystal. Now, Bomberman must face his most dangerous opponents ever!
